competitions.name: 2025AI安全全球挑战赛-赛道三：AI安全产品挑战赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 2025首届AI安全全球挑战赛是由阿里巴巴集团、阿里云联合发起。比赛面向全球招募参赛选手，赛道覆盖基础大模型越狱风险高阶对抗、大模型赋能传统应用时的新型攻击面探索、大模型安全防御产品绕过等多个前沿技术领域，不论你是AI领域专家，还是安全行业大拿，亦或是AI和安全爱好者，都能找到适合自己的挑战目标。

competitions.name: 2025AI安全全球挑战赛-赛道二：模型应用线上环境漏洞赏金赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 2025首届AI安全全球挑战赛是由阿里巴巴集团、阿里云联合发起。比赛面向全球招募参赛选手，赛道覆盖基础大模型越狱风险高阶对抗、大模型赋能传统应用时的新型攻击面探索、大模型安全防御产品绕过等多个前沿技术领域，不论你是AI领域专家，还是安全行业大拿，亦或是AI和安全爱好者，都能找到适合自己的挑战目标。

competitions.name: 2025AI安全全球挑战赛-赛道一：大模型安全攻防双向对抗赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 2025首届AI安全全球挑战赛是由阿里巴巴集团、阿里云联合发起。比赛面向全球招募参赛选手，赛道覆盖基础大模型越狱风险高阶对抗、大模型赋能传统应用时的新型攻击面探索、大模型安全防御产品绕过等多个前沿技术领域，不论你是AI领域专家，还是安全行业大拿，亦或是AI和安全爱好者，都能找到适合自己的挑战目标。

competitions.name: 2025全球AI攻防挑战赛-赛道三：泛终端智能语音交互认证-检测赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 随着AIGC的不断发展，语音生成正朝着高音质、高表现力、多手法、多风格、低门槛、小成本的方向迅速演进，创作者可以轻而易举地生产出各种各样的语音音频。这些技术的发展给内容创作者们带来了极大的便利，但也让不法分子有机可乘。在手机、眼镜、车载等泛终端的支付系统中，必须准确识别出语音是否为伪造音频，以避免不法分子通过操作克隆他人音色骗过核身系统实行盗用盗刷。因此判定一段音频是否为合成音频这一任务非常重要。

competitions.name: 2025全球AI攻防挑战赛-赛道三：泛终端智能语音交互认证-生成赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 随着AIGC的不断发展，语音生成正朝着高音质、高表现力、多手法、多风格、低门槛、小成本的方向迅速演进。这些技术的发展给内容创作者们带来了极大的便利，但也让不法分子有机可乘。在手机、眼镜、车载等泛终端的支付系统中，必须准确识别出语音是否为伪造音频，以避免不法分子通过操作克隆他人音色骗过核身系统实行盗用盗刷。

competitions.name: 2025全球AI攻防挑战赛-赛道二：AI视频智能交互认证-检测赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 随着生成式人工智能（AIGC）技术的突破性进展，视频生成能力正以惊人的速度提升，尤其是基于深度学习的人脸伪造（Deepfake）技术，已能实现高精度的面部特征迁移、表情控制与身份替换。

competitions.name: 2025全球AI攻防挑战赛-赛道二：AI视频智能交互认证-生成赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 随着生成式人工智能（AIGC）技术的突破性进展，视频生成能力正以惊人的速度提升，尤其是基于深度学习的人脸伪造（Deepfake）技术，已能实现高精度的面部特征迁移、表情控制与身份替换。

competitions.name: 2025全球AI攻防挑战赛-赛道一：图片全要素交互认证-检测赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description:
随着AIGC技术的发展，越来越多的AI手段和工具能够轻易对图片进行篡改，大量的不法分子也逐渐掌握PS、AIGC等工具制作逼真的篡改图像，并对数字社会的安全带来巨大挑战。
为此，图片全要素交互认证场景检测赛道将不再局限于单一场景，而是聚焦于所有可能被篡改的图像场景，包括自然图像、文档图像、人脸图像和生成图像。届时，将会发布大规模的全场景篡改数据集，参赛队伍在给定的大规模篡改数据集上进行模型研发，同时给出对应的测试集用于评估算法模型的有效性。

competitions.name: 2025全球AI攻防挑战赛-赛道一：图片全要素交互认证-生成赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 聚焦全要素图片生成，挑战防伪系统极限，推动数字图片真伪鉴别技术

competitions.name: Barbados ROAD Historic Handwriting Challenge
competitions.description: Can you identify handwritten words in historic and culturally significant scripts from the archives of Barbados?

competitions.name: Barbados Traffic Analysis Challenge
competitions.description: Can you identify the root causes of traffic in a Barbados roundabout?

competitions.name: Barbados Lands and Surveys Plot Automation Challenge
competitions.description: Can you identify and digitise important information in analog cadastral plans?

competitions.name: MPEG-G Microbiome Classification Challenge
competitions.description: Can you classify microbiome samples by body site and individual using compressed data?

competitions.name: MPEG-G: Decoding the Dialogue
competitions.description: Can you determine host-microbiome interactions in metagenomic data?

competitions.name: Your Voice, Your Device, Your Language Challenge
competitions.description: Can you build a Swahili ASR solution to give a voice to 100 million people?

competitions.name: GEOAI Challenge for Cropland Mapping in Dry Environments
competitions.description: Can you develop an accurate and cost-effective method for cropland mapping?

competitions.name: AI/ML for 5G-Energy Consumption Modelling
competitions.description: Can you predict energy consumption of different 5G products?

competitions.name: Smart Energy Supply Scheduling for Green Telecom Challenge
competitions.description: Can you predict daily solar energy generation and create optimal strategies for utilizing these energy sources?

competitions.name: RMB CPI Nowcasting Challenge
competitions.description: Can you nowcast South African CPI?

competitions.name: CGIAR Root Volume Estimation Challenge
competitions.description: Can you estimate cassava root volume from underground scanning images?

competitions.name: Wadhwani AI Bollworm Counting Challenge
competitions.description: Can you  improve a pest control app by counting the number of bollworm moths per image?

competitions.name: Spatio-Temporal Beam-Level Traffic Forecasting Challenge
competitions.description: Can you forecast traffic throughput volumes within communication networks?

competitions.name: Traffic Jam: Predicting People's Movement into Nairobi
competitions.description: Uber and Mobiticket team up to predict demand for public transportation into Nairobi

competitions.name: Farm Pin Crop Detection Challenge
competitions.description: Can you classify fields in South Africa by crop type using Sentinel-2 satellite imagery?

competitions.name: Inundata: Mapping Floods in South Africa
competitions.description: Can you identify where and when an urban flash flood happened in South Africa?

competitions.name: Uwazi Citizen Science Challenge
competitions.description: Can you collect data on African crops to contribute to the future of AI on the continent?

competitions.name: ITU Digital Financial Services Blockchain Secure Authentication Application Challenge
competitions.description: Can you build a passwordless authentication application?

competitions.name: Arm UNICEF Disaster Vulnerability Challenge
competitions.description: Can you identify thatch-roofed houses for disaster planning in rural Malawi using aerial images?

competitions.name: CGIAR Crop Damage Classification Challenge
competitions.description: Can you identify types of damage in cellphone images of crops?
